com.pgcraft.spectatorplus.arenas

Class ArenasManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pgcraft.spectatorplus.arenas.ArenasManager

  • public class ArenasManager
extends Object
    This class manages the arenas of SpectatorPlusOld.

    For an Arena to be recognized by SpectatorPlus, the object needs to be registered using registerArena(Arena).

    The Arena class is registered as a serializable one in the onLoad method of the main class.

    Since:
    2.0

        public Arena getArena(String name)
        Returns an Arena from his name.

        Case sensitive.

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Arena.
        Returns:
        The Arena, or null if there isn't any Arena with this name.

      • registerArena

        public void registerArena(Arena arena)
        Registers an arena.
        Parameters:
        arena - The arena to register.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if an arena with the same UUID is already registered.
        IllegalArgumentException - if an arena with the same name is already registered.
        Since:
        2.0
